Module kivakit.ui.desktop
Package com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.style

Class Style

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.style.Style
  • public class Style
extends java.lang.Object
    A style for configuring Swing components and drawing Java 2D shapes and text. A style has a fill color and stroke, a draw color and stroke, and a text color and font. Styles are designed to be reusable and new styles can be derived from existing styles using a variety of functional methods:
    • darkened() - A copy of this style where all colors are 10% darker
    • darkened(Percent) - A copy of this style where all colors are darkened by the given Percent
    • lightened() - A copy of this style where all colors are 10% darkened
    • lightened(Percent) - A copy of this style where all colors are lightened by the given Percent
    • translucent() - A copy of this style where the fill color has an alpha of 192
    • transparent() - A copy of this style where the fill color has an alpha of 0
    • withAlpha(int) - A copy of this style where the fill color has the given alpha value
    • withDrawColor(Color) - A copy of this style with the given drawing color
    • withDrawStroke(Stroke) - A copy of this style with the given drawing Stroke
    • withFillColor(Color) - A copy of this style with the given fill color
    • withFillStroke(Stroke) - A copy of this style with the given fill Stroke
    • withTextColor(Color) - A copy of this style with the given text color
    • withTextFont(Font) - A copy of this style with the given text font
    • withTextFontSize(int) - A copy of this style with the given font size
